titleInfo.title: Interior view of Friedman's Store, Brighton, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#672 Friedman Store, Brighton, Co, ca 1930s''. Notes on back of photograph: ''#Friedman Store Brighton, Co, 1930s #672''.

mods.abstract: Interior of Friedman's Store in Brighton, Colo., with a woman, two boys and one man standing with produce on the right side and glass cases on the left.
